item.title: OMGstop bring up old topics N 1 question
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“ancientday, post:3, topic:118877”]hell no and your bringing up topics that been died just trying to get some post count huh? cant earn it the right way?
by actually HELPING someone

Mod Adam like this?

case portalID: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You touch the portal"); actionTimer = 15; setAnimation(1114); addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[2]), 2); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break; [/quote]

Yes, exactly like that ancientday.

Read full topic
